metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: SQL Training
Introduction: SQL is a standard language for storing, manipulating and retrieving data in databases.
content.html: Introduction: SQL is a standard language for storing, manipulating and retrieving data in databases.

content.text: W3Schools offers an SQL training course that covers SQL foundations and more.
content.html: W3Schools offers an SQL training course that covers SQL foundations and more.

content.text: The course includes the W3Schools Certified SQL Developer certification.
content.html: The course includes the W3Schools Certified SQL Developer certification.

content.text: The SQL training is relevant for companies and schools that want to certify their employees or students.
content.html: The SQL training is relevant for companies and schools that want to certify their employees or students.

content.text: Organizations can track learner progress, get insights and manage everything from licenses to certificates with W3Schools Academy .
content.html: Organizations can track learner progress, get insights and manage everything from licenses to certificates with W3Schools Academy.

content.text: Remember that you can always learn for free on W3Schools with the SQL Tutorial .
content.html: Remember that you can always learn for free on W3Schools with the SQL Tutorial.

content.text: *Academy is available for companies and schools only.
content.html: *Academy is available for companies and schools only.

content.text: Track progress
Get analytics to track learner progress and results.
content.html: Get analytics to track learner progress and results.

content.text: Self-paced
Flexible timelines and pacing to match busy schedules.
content.html: Flexible timelines and pacing to match busy schedules.

content.text: Globally Recognized
Certifications that are trusted by leading organizations worldwide
content.html: Certifications that are trusted by leading organizations worldwide

content.text: SQL Training with W3Schools
W3Schools has been training millions of learners since 1998.
content.html: W3Schools has been training millions of learners since 1998.

content.text: Governments, schools, and organizations worldwide trust W3Schools to train employees and students.
content.html: Governments, schools, and organizations worldwide trust W3Schools to train employees and students.

content.text: W3Schools training materials and content have been well-proven over the years and are updated regularly.
content.html: W3Schools training materials and content have been well-proven over the years and are updated regularly.

content.text: With the W3Schools Academy pricing model, it is now one of the worlds most affordable quality SQL training options there is.
content.html: With the W3Schools Academy pricing model, it is now one of the worlds most affordable quality SQL training options there is.

content.text: Learning Outcomes
The Certificate Course includes all the training materials to pass the Certified SQL Developer certification exam.
content.html: The Certificate Course includes all the training materials to pass the Certified SQL Developer certification exam.

content.text: No prerequisites are required to take the course.
content.html: No prerequisites are required to take the course.

content.text: The learners will be able to:
content.html: The learners will be able to:

content.text: If you are not a company or school, you can still buy the course for personal use.
content.html: If you are not a company or school, you can still buy the course for personal use.

content.text: Read more about W3Schools courses here: W3Schools Courses
content.html: Read more about W3Schools courses here: W3Schools Courses

content.text: Certified SQL Developer
After completing the training modules the learner will take the end of pathway exam.
content.html: After completing the training modules the learner will take the end of pathway exam.

content.text: When the learner passes the exam, the learner will get the Certified SQL Developer certification.
content.html: When the learner passes the exam, the learner will get the Certified SQL Developer certification.

content.text: The exam is a multiple choice exam with 60 questions and a duration of 60 minutes.
content.html: The exam is a multiple choice exam with 60 questions and a duration of 60 minutes.

content.text: Image of a SQL Certificate:
content.html: Image of a SQL Certificate:

content.text: The certificate does not expire and is valid for lifetime.
content.html: The certificate does not expire and is valid for lifetime.

content.text: It is shareable and can be added to your CV or LinkedIn profile.
content.html: It is shareable and can be added to your CV or LinkedIn profile.

content.text: You can read more about the certificate here: SQL Certificate
content.html: You can read more about the certificate here: SQL Certificate

content.text: Track Learner Progress
As an employer or a school you can track learner progress and results.
content.html: As an employer or a school you can track learner progress and results.

content.text: Assign courses to learners with ease and get them started in no time.
content.html: Assign courses to learners with ease and get them started in no time.

content.text: With W3Schools Academy you can manage everything from licenses to certificates.
content.html: With W3Schools Academy you can manage everything from licenses to certificates.

content.text: It will give you everything you need to train your employees or students in different technologies.
content.html: It will give you everything you need to train your employees or students in different technologies.

content.text: Image of class overview in Academy:
content.html: Image of class overview in Academy:

content.text: You can read more about the Academy here: W3Schools Academy
content.html: You can read more about the Academy here: W3Schools Academy

content.text: Note: If you don't want to track progress, there is an option to give them access to the course without any management.
content.html: Note: If you don't want to track progress, there is an option to give them access to the course without any management.

content.text: Interactive Learning
The course is designed to be interactive and fun to learn.
content.html: The course is designed to be interactive and fun to learn.

content.text: The learner will engage with different learning activities to keep them engaged.
content.html: The learner will engage with different learning activities to keep them engaged.

content.text: This includes quizzes, code exercises, challenges, and a final exam.
content.html: This includes quizzes, code exercises, challenges, and a final exam.

content.text: Stay engaged with hands-on coding challenges that help you practice and test what you've learned.
content.html: Stay engaged with hands-on coding challenges that help you practice and test what you've learned.

content.text: Image of one of the activity types in the course, a SQL Challenge:
content.html: Image of one of the activity types in the course, a SQL Challenge:

content.text: SQL is best learned by doing, and this is why we have included a lot of challenges in the course.
content.html: SQL is best learned by doing, and this is why we have included a lot of challenges in the course.

content.text: You can read more about the different types of activities here: Coding Exercises
content.html: You can read more about the different types of activities here: Coding Exercises
